name: N-graft Cosmetics
description: Want to see the results of anti-aging stem cell therapy? Take photos before, during, and after treatment and save them to the photo gallery. The app will create a slideshow out of the gallery to let you compare the photos and keep track of your progress. You can set up a daily reminder to get notification that it has been some time since your last check-in. With N-graft Cosmetics app you will see how the cell rejuvenating therapy gradually regenerates your own bodys collagen matrix, providing a more plump and youthful appearance.  WITH N-GRAFT COSMETICS APP YOU CAN:  - Take and store photos of your skin - Get a reminder when its time to take a new photo - Share your photos with the N-graft Cosmetics team at your desire - Easily monitor skin changes in the most user-friendly way possible
